author: roberto.bayardo
content: Yeah looks like accesslist will deserialize as nil if it's empty. I can fix.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: I don't think it affected the ssz serialization though, as it would still serialize properly to an empty list when nil.

author: __flcl
content: <@131476523050860545> hello! Could you guys help us to test lighthouse-nethermind sync with a setting changed https://github.com/ethpandaops/4844-testnet/pull/49 ? The node can be fully reset after the update, let's see if it will help sync better

author: skylenet
content: done. wiped lighthouse and nethermind data on `lighthouse-nethermind-1` and started with that flag adjusted.

author: realbigsean
content:
If we're able to deploy this geth upate https://github.com/mdehoog/go-ethereum/pull/99

plus the latest `eip4844` lighthouse branch on the devent nodes, it should help other nodes sync. Right now the lighthouse nodes aren't serving finalized blocks that include blob transactions

author: inphi
content: we don't need to make changes to the EL for decoupled blobs. The blobs bundle will contain multiple blobs as before. The CL will then have to break up the bundle for gossip.

author: skylenet
content: I've just updated all lighthouse nodes. Will update geth once the PR gets merged

author: realbigsean
content:
Nice I was able to get a sync from genesis with that branch along with this one:

https://github.com/realbigsean/lighthouse/tree/devnet-4-compat

We did a rebase of our `eip4844` branch onto `capella` , and now require the `engine_exchangeCapabilities` endpoint there. So that `devnet-4-compat` branch is the one to use with the EL versions present on devnet 4

I don't think we'll end up merging it to `eip4844` because it's a bit hacky but we can if anyone's interested
